sentences.en: Become the type preventing explosion according to need but fabrication.
sentences.cn: 根据需要可制作成防爆型.

sentences.en: During fabrication slots for the stringers flanges were flame cut into box girders.
sentences.cn: 制造时,为安装纵梁翼缘,在箱型梁中用焰割法开槽口.

sentences.en: For a manufacturer, these will be materials used in the fabrication of the products.
sentences.cn: 对于制造商来说，这些成本是产品制造中使用的原材料成本。

sentences.en: Her story was a complete fabrication from start to finish.
sentences.cn: 她的叙述从头到尾都是编造出来的。

sentences.en: His story was a complete fabrication.
Many breakthroughs in fabrication techniques and new materials must be developed.
sentences.cn: 必须在制造技术和新材料的发展方面取得许多突破.

sentences.en: More than 200 improvements, many of them major, were made in the design and fabrication of the shuttle.
sentences.cn: 在航天飞机的设计及制造过程中，作了两百多项改进，其中很多是大的改动。

sentences.en: Punching and stamping is one of the important methodologies in metal fabrication.
sentences.cn: 板材制造中,冲压是一种主要的加工方式,占有重要地位.

sentences.en: The Code contains clauses on materials and workmanship for fabrication and erection.
sentences.cn: 代码包含在材料和手艺给制造和施工上的条款.

sentences.en: The extensive application of digital networks fully justifies the continuous efforts for advances in their fabrication.
sentences.cn: 数字网络的广泛应用充分说明继续不断地改进数字网络制造工艺是十分必要的.

sentences.en: The fabrication of the various optical waveguides has also been reported in considerable detail.
sentences.cn: 对各种光波导的制作技术也做了相当详细的报导.

sentences.en: These costs may be counterbalanced by the advantages of simplified fabrication, erection, and added aesthetics.
sentences.cn: 这些开销可由简化制造与安装及增添美观等优点来补偿.

sentences.en: These materials are suitable for fabrication of the cage of rolling contact bearings.
sentences.cn: 这些材料适宜于制造滚动轴承的保持架.

words.tran_cn: 焊接的；组合的，装配式的
织物；布；组织；构造；建筑物
制造，组装；伪造，捏造（fabricate的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 制造工序；加工工艺性；制造流程

trans.tran_en: a piece of information or story that someone has invented in order to deceive people
